channel.title: Fixing up my 508
channel.description:
Hey last weekend I opened up my server to the public after a couple of weeks of fixing it up. I knew there were problems with it but I did this to find out if there were anymore than i already knew of. Sure enough there was! So i have fixed some of it and some I need help with. This is what this topic is for. I wanted to know if anyone knew how to fix or know a tutorial to teach how to fix any of the following problems. I will edit this if I find more.
I know there's more than this, but of course, right when I go to make the thread my mind goes blank. I'll update this as I think of more.
[ul][li]Fixing Trading[/li] [li]Range. When used it crashes everyones client.[/li] [li]Accounts being reset.[/li] [li]Drops not showing right away[/li][/ul]
About trading: I found many tutorials for fixing this. The problem is, When the trade screen comes up, your inventory is not able to be used. example: If you clicked / right clicked an item to offer, a box comes up but all it says is cancel instead of Offer 1, Offer 5, Offer 10, ect.
About range: It crashes everyones client. If you look in the client console it says clean: shutdown or something like that. It doesn't happen if you are ranging from 15 or more sqaures away from opponent.
About accounts: Everyone once in a while someones account will get reset to lvl 3 and all items deleted. It's happend many times now to many different people, including my own account.
About drops: When someone kills a monster the drop only shows to playerid 0 instead of the person who killed the monster. So to get their drop they have to wait 1 minutes for it to show up.
In case you didn't notice the title it is a 508 server. It is also Bulby base.

item.title: Fixing up my 508
item.dc:creator: @tomjrmkay tomjrmkay
item.description:
@tomjrmkay wrote:

it USUALLY always saves their account. It just randomly happens to players like once every 3 days that it gets reset.

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing up my 508
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Well, i don’t do 508+, but im guessing players getting restarted = you need a saving process.

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing up my 508
item.dc:creator: @tomjrmkay tomjrmkay
item.description:
@tomjrmkay wrote:

[quote=“silabgarza, post:2, topic:284043”]heres my suggestion…

USE A BASE THAT DOESN’T THAT BUGS LIKE THIS[/quote]
That would be great except I already did so much work to it I would rather fix these than start over.

Read full topic
